mapper.insert: INSERT an_card ( cardId, cardContent, cardImg, createTime, updateTime, anonymId ) VALUES ( #{cardId}, #{cardContent}, #{cardImg}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{anonymId} )
mapper.select: SELECT card.`cardId`, card.`cardContent`, card.`cardImg` , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM an_cardcollection collection WHERE collection.`cardId`=card.`cardId`) AS collnum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM an_cardcomment comm WHERE comm.`cardId`=card.`cardId`) AS commnum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM an_cardfabulous fabul WHERE fabul.`cardId`=card.`cardId`) AS fabulnum FROM an_card card WHERE card.`delFlag` = 1 AND card.`isLock` = 1 ORDER BY card.`createTime` DESC ;
